name: Unboxing (Demo)
description:
Unboxing is a story based action adventure. The game takes place in a dystopian world were the only escape is to enter Virtual Reality. In the VR world the player will be showered with rewards. Unlock Achievements or kill enemies to receive credits, buy awesome equipment and talk to other characters to unravel the mystery of this dystopian world.

Unboxing is a student project. The team of three people worked on this for 5 weeks. We would greatly appreciate your feedback to improve the game and support our journey towards working in the games industry.
